website_summaries.verdict: The combination of sun protection, moisture-wicking and odor-reducing technology make this the ultimate outdoor shirt.
cons: These shirts tend to run small, so consider ordering the next size up

customer_reviews.title: I love this shirt and trust the seller.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shirt. It arrived promptly. I wear a dress size 2-4 and the size small fits me well. Before I proceeded to buy more UPF shirts from them I dug into the company a bit for verification that these shirts are actually certified to be called UPF protection and when I contacted Valor Apparel they sent me a copy of the lab tests verifying UPF 50+ for their white fabric. I really appreciated that.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: No more sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: We just got back from a vacation in Utah where we hiked nonstop for a week. I have never worn a long-sleeved shirt to hike in when it is warm, but this one was fantastic. Even though I packed other shirts, I kept washing this shirt in the sink, hanging it up to let it air dry, and wearing it the next day. Unfortunately, all my pictures look like I only have one outfit, so I intend to order a couple more in different colors. Much better than having to use sunscreen all day long. Since I ordered a medium (I usually order small) and it fit perfectly, you may want to consider getting a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: callie2

customer_reviews.title: Arizona Heat Test!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this on a bicycle ride under my jersey. It was 104 degrees. It was cool! I even tried one sleeve up to compare arms and the covered one was cooler because the radiant heat of the sun was hot! I sprinkled my sleeves with water and it was really cool for a while. I got it because my skin is starting to get age spots even with daily sunscreen so I have to cover up. I read reviews and got a large where I usually get medium. It was loose but not baggy. I would like it fairly tight to cycle in so next time I will get a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Saltwater girl

customer_reviews.title: a MUST-BUY for hot/sunny trip!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'3", 120lbs. I bought size Small in Columbia blue and it fit perfectly for me. I am SO GLAD I bought this for my 10-day trip to Israel. It was extremely hot and humid yet this shirt cooled me down significantly and kept me safe from the sun. While everyone else in my group was complaining how hot they were, I was not miserable like them. Mine did come with a teeny tiny hole in the armpit (I'm hoping they'll let me exchange the shirt), but I'd buy this again without a doubt because of how functional and cute it was for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kenna Naseman

customer_reviews.title: Miss sized or wrong product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XL in grey which fit me perfectly and so I ordered a yellow in XL but this one was WAY TO LARGE (fits like a 2xl or fitted for men). I think it is miss labelled or they sent me the MEN''S shirt since this one was not a ragglin sleeve like the grey I had ordered earlier. So now I have return it. But I did like the yellow color and light weight material.
customer_reviews.author: Violet Smotra-Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Shirt, But Not With Dirt
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how that lady hiking in Utah on these reviews was able to keep a fresh clean shirt on a week long hike. So I bought this shirt for sun protection. My first day outside I went kayaking. Upon launch we brushed against a bush on the riverbed that was full of sand. Sand left brown streaks all over the neck and sleeves. The only care instructions with packaging and online say to cold wash, and no fabric softener. Done. Dirt gone? No. Two washes and the streaks are still there. No further instructions from the company. First wear and now it is garbage. Thanks Vapor Apparel.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie G.

customer_reviews.title: I love this shirt!!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the sun off me while I run and does not hold in the heat! The drape is very flattering. It is stretchy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Major Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Good sun protection at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for some UPF shirts for hikes and outdoor activities that didn’t break the bank. What made me purchase this shirt over others on Amazon was the final fit and look. I love the scoop neck and curved flare at the bottom of the shirt. Makes the shirt look for tailored and fitted to me. The sleeves were just long enough, I am 5’9” and have long arms and was concerned it wouldn’t cover my wrist, but it does the job. Lightweight and cool material. Haven’t had any problems with it during washes. Will definitely be purchasing more in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Buy this shirt!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Such a great quality shirt! I purchased the gray and it is true to the color pictured. I am a 34 bust, 27 waist and I wear a size 4 dress and it fit like a dream. I wear this under scrubs at work and it wicks away moisture, kept me dry and cool all day, and didnt ride up! I have been searching for a quality shirt at a reasonable price and this is it! I even loved that the packaging had a personal touch with the brochure and tags that explained everything!
customer_reviews.author: CatieC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for South Florida
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is more than I expected. The material is quality made, soft, and most importantly lightweight. I need sun protection in South Florida but also need lightweight and as cool a possible. I'm 5'3" and weigh 138. After reading reviews I sized up from medium to large and it fits perfect. The sleeves break below my wrist but above my knuckles so can easily be turned up if needed. I especially like no itchy tag on my neck. The color was true to the picture and I'm ready to buy another since the price can't be beat for an SPF shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Diverdi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as I’m a fair-skinned redhead and I’m about to go to Hawaii. I’ve had many horrible burns in the past and I’m only in my early twenties, so I’ve decided to take more precautions. This fits as expected. I’m 5’7” and 140lbs, B cup, and I ordered a Medium. The shirt isn’t too tight or too loose. I was surprised that it was long—no butt crack! This may be a problem for shorter thin women though. As far as I can tell the shirt is great quality with a nice price tag! I got the Columbia Blue color—the picture makes it look more purple than in reality, but I don’t really care about that.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great shirts as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping for! We are taking a 8 day white water rafting trip! We were told that we need two short sleeved and two long sleeves shirts to take on the trip! I did quite a bit of research and decided on these! They are wonderful! I have washed them and worn them in our HOT Arizona climate before our trip in June! They are perfect! The bonus is they are MADE IN AMERICA!🇺🇸
customer_reviews.author: SavvyLady

customer_reviews.title: Great sunprotection
customer_reviews.text: I wore this shirt to an outdoor festival, sunny all day and around 90°F I was protected and not too hot. I did end up getting a slight burn around my neckline but that was my over sight because I had been wearing rash guard shirts the previous days so was more accustomed to the high neck line.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: NOT UPF 50+  -- misleading listing. It is "UPx50" which is meaningless marketing.  RETURNED same day. Bought Sbart instead.
customer_reviews.text: NOT UPF 50+ -- misleading listing. It is "UPx50" which is meaningless marketing. Google it - nothing comes up for UPx 50. The tag and booklet that came with it brags about sun protection with UPX 50+. There is no regulation..... FALSELY LISTED PRODUCT. Instead I've ordered these.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: way too small according to the amazon size chart a ...
customer_reviews.text: way too small according to the amazon size chart a large is a size 6!!! A size 8 is an XL Did not see that size chart until after I ordered it. Also note that the women's shirt is $5 more than the men' s shirt. So I ordered a medium in the mens. It does not have to fit perfectly. It is for walking and jogging and puting over a bathing suit at the pool.
customer_reviews.author: HONEST REVIEWER

customer_reviews.title: Vapor Apparel UPF 50+ size small
customer_reviews.text: I love the bright color for safety purposes. Wish more sun protection shirts were made in bright neon colors. Bought the Vapor Apparel UPF 50+ in size small, with being 5'2", 32C, 115 lbs, athletic build/broad shoulders. I like the sleeve length, but never hurts being a tad longer to cover hands if wanted. They should add the cut out for the thumb as an option. The only negative for me was that it was slightly tight around the armpit for my build. A great top despite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected, disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Shirt ran on the small side, even as an XL. It doesn’t breathe well, left me feeling hot and constructed. Most importantly, it didn’t work when it came to blocking the UV rays. I have brachioradial pruritus and sunlight triggers the itching on my arms. I live in a city where we’ve already hit 106 degrees outside and I’m choosing to wear a long sleeve, to prevent this itching. I can’t wear one that doesn’t breathe in this kind of heat, let alone actually protect my skin from the son.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for protect you from the sun
customer_reviews.text: This shirt saved me on a trip to the Southwest. I have very fair skin and always bathe myself in sunscreen. This helped tremendously, even in 90F+ heat in Arizona, it was surprisingly comfortable and somewhat breathable. Whenever I wore it, there was absolutely no trace of sun exposure. Would definitely recommend to anyone. I am 5'2", small chest, 105 pounds, and found the small to be way too big, but the XS fit perfectly. I imagine if you have larger breasts, you may want to size up a little.
customer_reviews.author: Kdub

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small, very warm to wear.
customer_reviews.text: I generally don't wear larger than a size large, but ordered this shirt in an XL to be safe. It's still very tight. It's also not breathable at all. I wore it out today in weather in the high 60's, and it was very hot to wear (much warmer than similar shirts I've owned in the past). All in all, I'm not going to get any real use out of this shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: I wear a medium (size 8) and I don't like tight fitting clothes so after reading reviews I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a medium (size 8) and I don't like tight fitting clothes so after reading reviews I ordered a Large. Well I got both shirts and yes the quality is nice, I was so happy!! I tried one on and took it off and packed them both to return. It was so snug and tight it was very uncomfortable and it was a Large and I wear a medium :-(
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and protective
customer_reviews.text: So happy I can protect my super fair skin with SPF clothing, I never even thought about it until I got sun poisoning at the beach. This shirt is so soothing on my destroyed skin! Absolutely adore the material. It is so light and airy and just comfortable! I would wear it as a pajama top even lol. The light blue is very pretty in person. I ordered a size up because I figured this type of material would be clingy. And it sure IS! ANY extra fat you have will be showcased. I plan to wear mine with a vest for hiking anyway so it'll be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Nice top size up for sure
customer_reviews.text: Love this top - i ride my bike in the am and if the sun burns off early in san diego this protects my arms from too much sun. I am bustier, so got an extra large as the other reviews recommend so it fit well. I usually wear large for sports tops, so size up is whati recommend. Sleeves are long for my short arms but roll them up a few inches no proble. Keeps me cool and wicks away sweat. Washes well too, hang dry
customer_reviews.author: K A gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Not great looking but would do the trick if you're not picky
customer_reviews.text: Went two sizes up per other people's reviews because I didn't want it to be too tight, and it's a little baggy so I probably could've just gone up one size. I will be returning anyway because I find the fabric to be much too shiny and cheap looking, and the cut is boxy (the sides are perfectly straight instead of slightly curved in, so it'll be loose around your waist and tight at the hips--makes production cheaper, but not a flattering look.) I would recommendif you are looking for good sun protection, it felt much higher quality and offers hand and head coverage for ten bucks more.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Threads coming out
customer_reviews.text: Very bad quality, ALL threads are coming out around bottom, neck and under armpit & sleeves. I’ve worn 3x and it is falling apart. DO NOT BUY! Go to sporting goods store and spend more for the best quality. I was in a rush otherwise that is what I would have done, now I am waiting for the company’s response to return these. Quality has no price, I’d rather spend 10-20 dollars more and have my shirts for many years rather than waste money on something I can’t even donate after because it fell apart. We have enough trash in the landfills and that alone is enough for me not to buy rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: Francesco

customer_reviews.title: These are great for sun protection.
customer_reviews.text: These Solar Performance UPF Long Sleeve T-Shirt for both my wife and I are great. I live in the Miami area and two weeks ago while boating and spending 4 hours in a sandbar in Elliot Key we were roasted. We decided to buy these t-shirts and last week we returned to the sandbar and spent 4 hours under the Florida sun and we didn't experience any sunburn,flaking skin nor itching skin. I recommend as an additional protection to apply sunscreen to your skin prior to wearing the t-shirt. Prior to this review i decided to wash them in the washing machine and let them air dry, they fit exactly the same as the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Fer

customer_reviews.title: the shirt looked good but DID NOOT BREATHE
customer_reviews.text: It said it was comfortable, but I found that it DID NOT BREATHE, and was not comfortable to me at all.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a shirt from Vapor and one from BALEAF. I expected the Vapor to fit better as it looks more fitting on the model (and it was $3 more than the BALEAF shirt). It does fit better as the BALEAF was larger, which gives it a boxy look. The Vapor is more form fitting. I ordered a medium in both. Both are fine for sun protection. Ill wear both. If you want to save a few bucks and/or you have longer arms, you won't go wrong with the BALEAF but I'm more likely to buy the Vapor due to the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I burn very easily, so a trip to Hawaii is accompanied with ...
customer_reviews.text: I burn very easily, so a trip to Hawaii is accompanied with a fair amount of worry. I once was laid up in bed for 3 days with sun poisoning after spending 15 minutes in the Florida sun - though sunscreens are much better now. This item is pretty but not very fitted like the Cool Gear. Best of all, no sunburn or even redness! if you want to tan, stay away, if you want to play in sun and surf without the tanning part - this is your garment! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wisdom & Wit (sometimes)

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion the sizes run a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I'm a very trim/slim person,but had previously ordered a large to accommodate my curves, but found it a bit snug. The x- large is too big and I have to roll up the sleeves. I realize this could be my problem and is not a problem with this shirt but I'm not sure the sizes are true to women sizes. That being said the shirt itself works very nicely and I played tennis for several hours in blistering heat and it kept me very cool!
customer_reviews.author: Wallabbie

customer_reviews.title: Dries super fast, washes well and indeed has spf
customer_reviews.text: Dries super fast, washes well and indeed has spf. I usually feel my shoulders burn right away when i get in the sun and its significantly mitigated with this shirt. Downsides are - this is polyester, so if it catches on anything or rubs against anything splintery, the damage is very noticeable. Its not entirely stain resistant - so, for being outdoors or having an active lifestyle it will make the shirt look worn down very quickly. Color selection kind of sucks. If there was a heather grey or a pattern that could hide stains and scuffs better it would be ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Reese Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight shirt for fall!
customer_reviews.text: Great value here! Colors are stunning. For a lightweight shirt, I would say it's on the heavier side. Not too heavy for fall hiking or biking, but me personally I would not wear this as a sun protection shirt in warmer weather. I'm 5'3" and 140lbs with athletic build and the medium shirt fits perfectly. Sleeves are not too long - yay! and the length is perfect, just covering the top of my pants/shorts but not going down over my butt at all. Win!
customer_reviews.author: robint

customer_reviews.title: Good value, watch the size
customer_reviews.text: I don't like tight clothes. I wear a size 10-12 . The x-large I ordered fit as I wanted. It is not really loose or baggy, just loose enough to skim the body. Nice fabric, love this pink. By Misses size standards I'd say it runs small. Order up.
customer_reviews.author: Booklady1

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, wash great, protects body from sun
customer_reviews.text: Love these sun protection long sleeve shirts. They definitely protect me from the sun. Love the raglan sleeves -when I wear it under another golf shirt the seams at the shoulders don't show, making a great look. These shirts wear really well, but the sun has a tendency to yellow the sleeves after three years in the sun. I wear them fours times a week when I golf. I just bought three more for me and my husband wears them as well to keep the skin-damaging Arizona sun off his arms. I LOVE these shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Got2Golf

customer_reviews.title: These shirts do not fit any woman with a fuller chest
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the men's version for myself--I work outside in the heat at a plant nursery--and I wanted to get one for one of my female colleagues to try. We tried twice to purchase this shirt, but even the largest size did not fit her (and she's not huge up front or anything). I love them for me, but until they adjust the fit (and point that out in their advertising), I woudn't recommend them for my female friends unless they are very slim and like a TIGHT fit.
customer_reviews.author: jw fulton

customer_reviews.title: Soft and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Loose, lightweight and comfy for jogging! I haven't tried it out in 70+ degree weather yet. I wore it in drizzling, humid weather and it dried up within minutes. I wish I ordered an XS, since a small fits a bit loose on me. (5'7", 115 lbs.) Careful not to puncture through the fabric with any safety pins or needle-like object. My shirt arrived in a plastic bag with a little teeny hole in one of the sleeves due to a removed price tag perhaps. It looked like the start of a run in the fabric. (I quickly stopped it with clear nail polish.)
customer_reviews.author: Lisamet

customer_reviews.title: Depending on your body type, suggest ordering up a size.
customer_reviews.text: I note 'somewhat small' only because I usually wear a small and ordered a medium based on reviews. For the fit I wanted, this shirt runs small. I'm 5'5" tall, 125 pounds, lean, small chested and don't need extra tummy room. The medium fits nicely, not tight like a compression UA shirt but also not swimming in this shirt. Depending on your build, suggest consider ordering up a size. If sizes are true, I'd expect the small to be a skin snug shirt for my size/build. hope this helps :) I did order the grey and it's just pretty basic, I'll like it (just rec'd so haven't yet worn outside).
customer_reviews.author: EA F.

customer_reviews.title: Did not provided sun protection as advertised! Arms burned right through shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Did NOT provide UPF protection as indicated. I wore twice for 3-hour hike in mixed wooded/lake area with poles. So, some sun exposure. I have very fair skin. My forearms burned right through the shirt. I have had other sun shirts of the woven variety that provided full sun protection with more sun exposure. I am very disappointed. I had hoped this product would work out as it is easier to move in and is actually long enough in the sleeves -- a rarity.
customer_reviews.author: Wlfsdrgn

customer_reviews.title: Seams Completely Unraveled after Just a Couple of Washes
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this shirt a couple of months. After just a couple of washes the ENTIRE shirt’s seams unraveled. So disappointed! I live in FL and would have bought one in every color but I won’t after seeing its poor manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary D.

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking shirt!
customer_reviews.text: After having skin cancer removed, I thought I should do a better job of protecting myself and my husband from the sun rays! I bought this shirt for myself and my husband for our hiking vacation in Tucson Arizona. I was concerned about wearing long sleeves while hiking in 110 degree heat but was pleasantly surprised that the shirt felt pleasant! I had zero sun tan or burn after hiking for hours! My husband also loved his shirt and so we've bought two more. I am 5ft 4in and 130 lbs and the size small fits perfect with room to wiggle. It is very comfortable and even kind of cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protect your arms!
customer_reviews.text: Wore it on an 85 degree/90% humidity afternoon bike ride (21 miles in about 1 hour, 15 minutes) and it kept off the sun and it wasn't too hot. Waiting at stop lights it was hot, but it was hot for those who were sleeveless as well!
customer_reviews.author: Run and cycling chick

customer_reviews.title: This will save my life
customer_reviews.text: My skin is whiter than most porcelain dolls, meaning going out in the sun is perilous. I get tired of sunscreen by like the second week of May - fast forward to July and I get burned daily. I bought rhis shirt hoping to avoid long term damage and love it. It really does work to block sun, but is breathable enough that I don't get hot. I did get burned today after mindlessly pushing my sleeve up while gardening, but that's on me. I will absolutely buy more of these.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful top!
customer_reviews.text: It was beautiful but a little small for what i wanted to use it for. I bought a size larger because i wanted it real loose. I am on medication that i need to limit sun Exposure for a couple weeks. It was just not loose enough for me. I wanted to wear it driving to protect my arms and to be able to pull it off easily and it was not loose enough. But for someone wanting to wear it for running, etc it would be perfect. It felt great, looked great and if I needed another running shirt i would have kept it. Customer service was fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great product but does run small
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size "medium" but based on all the feedback, I ordered a "large." That was a good thing because the large fits with no room to spare. Thanks to everyone for the feedback. I love the shirt and ended up ordering a second one. I don't know how they do it but it actually does cool you so you can get away with wearing it in warm sunlight. When I first put it on indoors, it actually had a chilling affect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs really small
customer_reviews.text: I had read other reviews that indicated that this shirt runs small so I ordered a large instead of my usual medium. The large fits but it’s close to form fitting. I couldn’t imagine needing an extra large but I think that would have been more comfortable. The 3 star rating is from the hassle of not getting the sizes right. The material feels okay and I haven’t yet worn it as sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit, sun protecting, and worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I bought two shirts from here for my trip to the Rocky Mountains and they were perfect. I hiked in these shirts all day and didn't have a problem with overheating or getting sun burnt. The reviews said the shirt runs small, but since I'm tiny (5 feet, 100 lbs), I went ahead and bought an XS anyway. Based on the images the shirt looks like it's supposed to be tight fitting, which it is. It fits pretty well, but the area under the armpit is a little tight, but that did not bother me. If I went a size up, the shirt may have been too loose on me.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: great alternative to sunscreen when active outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I bought my regular size expecting it to be large based on previous reviews but it actually fits me smaller than expected, especially in the length. I wore it for a run the first time last weekend and it was hot and sunny. I didn't get burned at all, and even my freckles which usually come out under sunscreen didn't come out. I bought it for the main purpose of sun protection while running due to my history of melanoma and it seems to work as promised without making me overheat. I'd buy it again, just a size up.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherMT

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt, kept me burn free
customer_reviews.text: Ordered an xl due to my chest size. This fit perfectly and was very light weight and breathable. I used it on our river trip in August and worked great against the lovely Texas sun and heat. Also used it again in Punta Cana In August as well. It does keep you very cool and feels like your not wearing anything even when it’s wet. It also dries very fast as well. It is very see through so don’t use as a regular shirt.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisL

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size larger then you usually do
customer_reviews.text: Nice material and comfortable to wear. I normally wear a Large, but based on the Size Chart and reviews, I ordered an Extra Large. I am 5'3" and weigh 143 and wear bra size 38C. Shirt feels a little large on top, but would be too snug to go down a size as it is more fitted in the torso. Sleeves too long, but I can roll them up. All in all, a good deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: mlh

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the blazing hot sun off me
customer_reviews.text: I use this top for all swimming activities which is a minimum of 3 times a week, sometimes as many of 7 or more a week in the summer. I have 3 white ones and I love them. It keeps the sun off me and is comfortable to wear. I like them a little bit big on me so I use a large. Obviously I like them as I just bought 2 more recently.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in these shirts
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in these shirts. Unable to wear in the humid sun of Florida summer. Supposed to have wicking to keep you dry but I felt like I was suffocating. Tried to use on a fishing outing. Thankfully I brought a lightweight T shirt to change into. There is no breathing or evaporation that I could detect. It may protect from sun but unless you like to swelter forget it. Might keep me warm in the winter but I don't care for the fit so can only use as a layering piece.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy H. Schechter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shirt for Golf
customer_reviews.text: I wore this shirt golfing yesterday in 97 degree heat in AZ. I wore it under my golf shirt. It is not skin tight, but did work under another shirt. It definitely protected me from the sun! No sunblock required. It was very comfortable to wear. Did not make me warmer, but was not cooling either. Really did not notice it at all and that is a good thing!! The best part for me is that the sleeves are long enough. I am tall and have long arms. It fits me beautifully 👏 Will be purchasing more of them.
customer_reviews.author: catgirl

customer_reviews.title: Fit well, just couldn’t get over the sticky/slinky feeling ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, just couldn’t get over the sticky/slinky feeling. In its defense, I rolled ups sleeve and didn’t notice much diffference. I’m going to give it a few more tries in drier climates to test before I give up on it hiking. If nothing else I will use it to throw on and pull weeds for a bit. :)
customer_reviews.author: Zennifer

customer_reviews.title: The fit is great, it is a looser fit than other similar ...
customer_reviews.text: I sized up from a Med. to a LG. The fit is great, it is a looser fit than other similar tops I've ordered. I haven't washed it, but I don't hand wash anything. I put those items in a separate bag, zip it up and toss it in the wash then hang dry. Hope this helps y'all to find the right size, I'm 5'7" and weigh between 155-158 as stated above I usually wear mediums, but always size up when buying bathing suits, SPF shirts/pants etc.. I put only 4 stars because I don't trust five star reviews :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This shirt is made completely of polyester. It is ...
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is made completely of polyester. It is hot and doesn't breathe. If you're looking for a sun shirt, look for one that has bamboo, cotton, spandex blend. I thought this was the same brand I bought before that was bamboo, but it wasn't. I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryll B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice color.  Way too small.  Does it work???
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't know how well these shirts protect you from the sun. I got the mint-green color, and I do like the color. I got an XXL, which normally should fit me okay, but these shirts run extremely small. I look like a sausage. So I can't wear the shirt on its own; I have to wear another shirt/jacket on top.
customer_reviews.author: veggieveggievegveg

customer_reviews.title: This is my second shirt
customer_reviews.text: Great UPF shirt! This is my second shirt in a different color and size. I'm 5'3, 116 lbs. My first shirt is a small and even though the sleeve length is longer than average, it is a slightly snug around the armpit area. Still wearable but purchased a second in medium for days when I prefer a looser shirt. Lets not kid ourselves, its still going to be warm in hot weather but much better than having to slather on sunscreen or having your bare skin exposed to the sun.
customer_reviews.author: babers

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, stitching loose but otherwise OK
customer_reviews.text: I ordered up one size based on reviews. The item does run small but ordering one size larger fixed the problem. I like the shirt except that upon arrival there was already a hole in the stitching of the sleeve. I will be able to sew it together myself so I will keep the shirt because it is otherwise fine. It does make me wonder about any future purchases though. For the price paid, the stitching should not be so shoddy.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. G.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Good for Working Outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I live in the woods and have become very conscientious about warding off ticks and mosquitos when I'm gardening or working outside. No more bare head, short sleeves and shorts! Everything I read says, "Use insect repellent containing DEET, wear long-sleeved shirts, and pants tucked in your socks/shoes" . . . . . so I ordered this shirt to try. I like it because it's lightweight, and I ordered more so I can throw it into the wash when I'm finished. I also wear a gardening hat and spray all clothing with Permethrin.
customer_reviews.author: 3Acres

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2-3  sizes small
customer_reviews.text: The mens large fits fine if baggy around the middle, i wanted ladies shape, but this is 2 sizes at least too small. My daughter is a size 6-8, and the 2 x barely fit her like a standard medium. Mens xl is HUGE, hangs 8 inches over my hands and goes to my knees. Why do womens sizes have to be so ridiculously tiny?
customer_reviews.author: NurseDawn

customer_reviews.title: snug fit like a swim shirt
customer_reviews.text: This fit was very similar to the Baleaf brand I bought in the same style: snug like a swim shirt or workout clothing. It kept me cool in the hot summer heat of NM and protected from the sun. I have long arms and this shirt fit adequately. I would have liked an extra 1/2 " but was still pleased that it wasn't short like most long sleeve shirts. Very comfortable and looking forward to use in outdoor sports and gardening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Threads were loose on bottom hem I was disappointed. Was trying to find clothes that were breathable ...
customer_reviews.text: Too loose in neck, felt icky to wear. Threads were loose on bottom hem I was disappointed. Was trying to find clothes that were breathable and protection from sun burn.
customer_reviews.author: CleverNow2

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sunshirt
customer_reviews.text: This sunshirt surprised me with its feminine slightly tapered fit and exceptional quality. I have very light skin, and I always look for ways to avoid sun damage. This shirt is lightweight and breathable for those hot summer days in the sun. It runs true to size. I bought several colors so that I am protected from sunburn during long swim meets and beach days with my family.
customer_reviews.author: Anna C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for activities in summer heat
customer_reviews.text: A tennis friend recommended this brand. She wore a long sleeved shirt and neck gaitor to our first summer fun match. It was 95 degrees and 90%humidity so we laughed at her. But I ended up wanting to try it. Sun protection for chest and arms is good but also it helped me keep my body temp down. It’s comfortable as well. Lots of pretty colors. Forgiving fabric. I’m a size 6 with narrow shoulders. My friend is a busty bigger boned size 8/10 and we both took a medium. We weren’t buying for fashion though! Another friend got one for her hubby to wear when he cuts grass and gardens. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L.

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt! Excellent sun protection.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shirts. Perfect for working outside in the garden or mowing the lawn, hiking and having good sun protection too. It’s crazy hot where I live in the summer and these shirts wick sweat when working outside. I am 5’8” so the medium is the best fit, small was just too tight. They are a little sheer but not so sheer that you need an under shirt. I’ve bought two already.
customer_reviews.author: Emiley

customer_reviews.title: Nice neutral colors
customer_reviews.text: Nice neutral colors. The sleeves on the Large were comfortable whereas I also ordered a Medium in the Baeleaf version of this same shirt and the sleeves were a little too tight. It's the exact same shirt from both suppliers. I usually wear medium but a large worked better for me. The length of the shirt is a little too long for my tastes so won't vent as well while hiking. I will wear it because it seems like a good fabric but would be nice if they improved it even more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars because it is exactly "as advertised". The color is true to the picture and the fit is also...slightly loose. I just needed a rash guard to wear when I work outside. And I thought the price was right. I wish it was patterned, because I'm sure I will stain it up in no time, but I didn't want to go with a dark color because I wanted a more reflective color. This would not be my choice for something to wear to go out socially. It has that "poly double knit" look to it...slightly shiny.
customer_reviews.author: RosiesNPosies

customer_reviews.title: Awesome invention!
customer_reviews.text: I live in hot cali weather where its triple digits all through summer and unfortunately my job setting has me in car all day as well as being outdoor with kids. My arms were getting super sun damaged on drivers side but its too hot to put on long sleeves. I can actually say Ive worn this short when it was 105 degrees and didn't sweat bullets! Gonna get more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Lin Lin

customer_reviews.title: Vapor
customer_reviews.text: I weigh under 100 lb and usually wear xs. I'm glad I ordered a small, because it is very fitted and the extra small would have been too small! I love the cut and color. Between my husband and I, we have seven or eight of these shirts now, and enjoy them!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Galloway

customer_reviews.title: ... both men and women sizes both shirts work just fine..
customer_reviews.text: ordering both men and women sizes both shirts work just fine... with a history of melanoma I cover up as much as possible. sunscreen is just "slimy" and can be uncomfortable. But is needed. I love the shirts I got from you and will be looking for more items in the future. I volunteer for the National Wildlife Service and will be on the coast of Oregon all summer... looking for layering clothing and these will work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Waianaegal

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wear a seat belt as it will ruin you shirt
customer_reviews.text: Exasperating! After wearing the shirt for the first time, you could clearly see where the seatbelt of the car I had been riding in had ruined the shirt😆
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and dries overnight
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Wore in high 90's, low humidity heat. Washed, rolled in a towel, dry by morning so great for travel. If you really need sun protection, consider that since this shirt doesn't have a collar, you'll have to add something to protect neck/shoulder area not covered by shirt.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Runs slightly small, stains easily
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shirt for an all day fishing trip in Savannah at 98 degrees F. I knew there would be no chance of shade and needed to try and prevent catastrophic sunburn. This definitely did the job. I never felt suffocated from the long sleeves, it definitely breathes very well. The reason I gave it a lower rating was due to the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Wizmedic30

customer_reviews.title: Favorite top!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for golf sun protection. It is wonderfully comfortable, drapes nicely, breathes & the wicking effect is very good. It washes well, but best to hang it immediately out of dryer (can wrinkle). I will order more of these! Size: I ordered one size up and it fits slightly big, but flattering and easy to move in.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Best sun shirt ever!
customer_reviews.text: This shirt was awesome! Both my husband and I got them to wear to a theme park and they were great. It was 90°we were outside all day and didn't get burned. I was much more comfortable than most bare skinned people there. I'm very fair and did not burn. I read reviews saying the sizes ran small so I ordered size bigger than normal and was happy with the fit. I was worried they would be see through as lots of those types of shirts are but it wasn't. It's clingy so you may see outlines of undergarments depending how tight you get it. Would ordered again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rojo

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are a bit inconsistent, otherwise I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small, and it fit. I work outdoors, and have a lot of pre-cancerous stuff on my arms. They’re also nice to dampen , and they help keep you cooler. The next time I ordered two, same size, but one of them is pretty tight in the armpit and is irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Mel's Mrs.

customer_reviews.title: ( The sleeves are really long if you like that. The material is soft
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size large and they are plenty roomy. I bought the extra large in this shirt based on other buyer's reviews that it runs small. It still fits too snug :( The sleeves are really long if you like that. The material is soft. If you have a boyish figure, this would probably be a good shirt for you. If I hadn't waited a while to try it, I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: N.H.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, fit, and cut. Gives me confidence to know I’m not getting sun damage. I’ve never worn these before, it’s definitely not as breezy as a tank top but I haven’t overheated, I sweat and it dries quick. I will probably order more since I only have one and I’m outside nearly everyday.
customer_reviews.author: kemd278

customer_reviews.title: If you like looking like a stuffed sausage
customer_reviews.text: If I weight 70 pounds, then this would had fit. If you like looking like a stuffed sausage, then order these. I wear a small in tops. I ordered a small. It was unwearable. I thought, "Okay, I am just fat now. Let me order a large." It's still way too small. The sizing is so silly. I am 5'0 and 120 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Melany C.

customer_reviews.title: Made for an anorexic...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this shirt is evident. But it is definitely sized for a tall very skinny woman. I am of average height and weight, and I like a looser fit, so I purchased the XXL and it was skin tight. I generally wear a large top because of my broad shoulders, but this was rediculously small. I hate to buy men's clothing as the arms are way too long. Looks like it is back to Bass Pro Shops for performance shirts! Theirs are at least true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Love this shirt! Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews, but the Vapor Apparel Women's UPF 50+ UV Sun Protection Performance Long Sleeve T-Shirt -- and Vapor Apparel deserve a 5-star rating. The shirt fits well and is well made. I am partial to more muted colors, so loved that there was a pale yellow color choice. Aside from being happy with the shirt, I was especially impressed Vapor Apparel's customer service. They responded quickly to my email and the issue I had was immediately addressed. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Camille A. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: I like the shirt that was sent
customer_reviews.text: I like the shirt that was sent. I ordered a M because people said they ran a little large. The company sent me a Men's M instead of a Woman's M so I can't really speak to sizing for women. The men's M fits as most men's M do for me. I am using the shirt outside on the water so having it a little big is not a big deal. The shirt is very light weight and I like that. It has not gotten wet (I have not fallen in the water with it on) so I can't yet speak to how quickly it dries... yet.
customer_reviews.author: Honestly

customer_reviews.title: Love the Shirt--Good Price!..Very Comfy & Cool!!
customer_reviews.text: I listened to the other reviewers regarding size, and glad I did. Normally, I always wear a medium. So, I ordered a Large and it fits perfect. Material is soft & comfortable. I just ordered 3 more. Living in California where temps get well over 100 degrees in the Summer. And being very fair, this has been a god-send for me to be able to work outside at our Ranch and not get Sunburned. At first, I was concerned that the long sleeves would be hot and sticky in the high temps. But, they are not at all. I really like the higher scoop neck too. Plus, I'm saving money by using less Sunscreen Lotion...A+++++ in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Magpie

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking top and fits me as expected. I like my tops a little roomy. My only complaint is that it is really hot in the Arizona summer heat. I like the UV protection and do find that most UPF sun protection shirts are very warm in the Arizona summer climate.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great shirt to wear kayaking over the weekend. I burn easily, so I am always reapplying sun screen and often still getting burned, especially the tops of my arms. Wearing this shirt I didn't get burned on my arms at all, total protection. It is also soft and comfortable to wear. I normally wear a size medium but ordered a large based on other reviews. The large fit nicely, not super snug and not super loose either.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good shirt BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Good shirt. It is a little bit more on the loose side. I do agree with the reviewer who stated that this shirt is a little bit warm in comparison to other UPF clothing. This type of clothing usually has a cooler feel to it and it feels more silky and more repellent to water. This shirt won't really cool you down on a hot summery day and it doesn't dry as fast as other UPF clothing. It does have a more cottony feel to it in that sense. Overall I do like the shirt however, and I do wear it often.
customer_reviews.author: Hazy Mist

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit.
customer_reviews.text: I'm excited about my new shirt. I purchased it in the Safety Yellow, and think it will be great riding my motorcycle. The fit is perfect for me... slim enough to look trim, but not stretched tight. I am 5'6" tall, 135lb, and 38B. I usually purchase size M shirts. Love the girly shape to the cut, compared to the "Angler Fit" on the women's SPF shirt I got from Magellan. A little disappointed by how bright my white bra looks under it, but I'll have my vest on anyways, or can wear a beige bra. Overall, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: NH girl at heart

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: The fabric and construction seems to be of good quality. The sleeves are way to long, but the rest if the shirt fits well. It stays close to the body in water. It does take long to dry.
customer_reviews.author: G. Poppenwimer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: One word: LOVE. I've been looking for a good sleeve to wear when hiking that is breathable and doesn't make me hot! I would highly recommend this product. I would also recommend going a size up if you want a more looser fit. The fabric is highly breathable and great for sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: honeybunny

customer_reviews.title: I like that there are a wide range of colors
customer_reviews.text: The shirts met my expectations. I needed long sleeves to protect my arms from sunburn as I have photo-sensitivity. I was able to wear them in tropical weather and not feel overheated or sticky from the humidity nor did I burn. No need for sunscreen. I usually wear a medium but ordered large as the description said sizes ran small. It fit perfectly. I like that there are a wide range of colors. I plan to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and cool
customer_reviews.text: I feel this shirt provided the protection from moisture and sun as advertised. I did not feel moisture buildup while walking. I walk in the morning before the sun is at full force and feel it would be just as effective if I was out at it's highest peak.
customer_reviews.author: Texas reader

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I put this on over a swimsuit or sports bra before running or doing yard work and have even done some swimming in it. It's very lightweight and thin, which I love for this purpose. I am 5'4, 108 lb, and the XS is somewhat fitted but not snug on me. I would go up one size if looking for a loose fit.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Wise

customer_reviews.title: Long shirts and sleeves!!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I ordered up a size and the shirts are still snug around armpits across upper chest. I am 6' tall and have long arms and I am impressed that the sleeves and body of shirt are long enough! Shirts came very fast. I just wish they fit me right.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this shirt! I can’t be in the sun for health reasons and this shirt allows me to go for walks outside without risking sun exposure. It’s lightweight and breathable and the color is nice! I got the blue and will be ordering more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kitt

customer_reviews.title: Size Up
customer_reviews.text: The fabric of this shirt feels really soft to the touch. It’s breathable and has a “cooling” sensation, so I can wear it during really hot days here in Florida and be protected from the sun. I don’t know if I can really trust that it’s got UV protection built in, but at least it’s got long sleeves 🤷🏽‍♀️ Size: I sized up and ordered a Large (usually a s/m. Chest 36 in) but I read other comments that said these run small and I’m glad I listened. A medium would’ve been a tight fit. All in all, it was a good buy and I might be getting more.
customer_reviews.author: Yohanna W

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 5!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go hiking. I went to southern Utah last week and these were perfect to keep the sun off my skin. I was never too warm/uncomfortable. What I found interesting was: 1) my sports bra could be soaked from hiking...but the shirt was never wet, 2) I wore a cotton short-sleeved shirt one day and it was amazing how much I perspired. I changed into one of these. It has complete coverage...no burning underneath shirt. I was outside for hours and hours everyday. I am 5'6 and 120lbs. I bought a large and it was perfect
customer_reviews.author: L. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Don't go up a size.  Stick with your regular size
customer_reviews.text: The mistake I made here is reading all the reviews where everyone said to go up a size. I am a straight size medium but based on reviews I ordered a large. Mistake. I can wear it...it's a great shirt. Large is too big though. So I ordered a second one in medium and it fits like a charm. I personally recommend you stay with your regular size. If you are a medium...order a medium. I love the shirt. It will be great for layering under flannel shirts..etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lola 48

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is really off!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this in an XXL woman's so it would be roomy, since an XL is normally a good fit for me. It is cut very small, actually narrow in the body, typical of a size L or even Medium !!! Seeing it is foreign made I am not surprised but I am disappointed, especially since the company is from South Carolina. I like the feel of the fabric and the features it says the shirt has but had to send it back and am afraid to reorder in an even larger size, if it even comes larger.
customer_reviews.author: Iflycesna

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size medium, but after reading reviews I ordered the large. That was a mistake. The large was way too big for me. The one thing I did not like about the shirt is the neckline. It is not a crew neck, but more of a scoop neck. That leaves a lot of skin at the base of the neck and upper chest exposed. For that reason alone I would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered xtra large size hoping for a loose fit. This item is too tight in the arms and chest. I am disappointed. Also, I missed the return date window by a few days and now cannot return the item. I didn't know there was a date expiration for returns.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This is an updated review. I had an issue with this shirt where the hem came out after only a very few wearings. After providing feedback to the seller, but problem was immediately resolved. I will be receiving a replacement shirt! They were quick to respond and took care of the problem with no hassles. Great customer service! (by the way - these are great shirts. Perspiration wicks quickly and dries quickly. No more soggy runs and I am well protected from the sun.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vapor Apparel Women’s UPF 50+ UV Sun Protection Long Sleeve Performance Slim Fit T-Shirt for Sports and Outdoor Lifestyle
feature_bullets: PERMANENT PROTECTION: The UPF 50+UV/Sun Protection technology blocks the sun’s rays and is built into the fabric, unlike other shirts. Our fabric is recommended by The Skin Cancer Foundation as an effective UV protectant.

PERFORMANCE WEAR: Lightweight 100% Microfiber Polyester jersey-like shirt with PURE-tech moisture-wicking technology, which is permanently infused with the fabric to keep you dry. The Anti-odor technology keeps you fresh and odor-free.

ACTIVE LIFESTYLE: Built for athletic activities like swimming, fishing, running, hiking, playing softball, or simply sitting at the beach all day. This t-shirt provides optimal protection for any outdoor activity like mowing the lawn or gardening.

FIT FEATURES: The set-in-shoulder construction provides a great fit and a natural, flattering shape. It is true to size in the shoulder and slimmer fitting through the body. Refer to our size chart in product images to find your best fit.

BEST CARE: Hand or machine wash in cold water and hang dry. In order to maintain the quality of this shirt, fabric softener is not required and not recommended. Sun protection properties are enhanced after several washes and wear.
